entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
